terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: SmartHoster.io ("we," "us," "our," or "SmartHoster") is a digital and physical service provider operated by BBAR Unipessoal LDA, offering short-term rental property management, automation tools, and infrastructure to property owners ("you," "your," or "Client"). By using our services or accessing our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service.

sections.title: Eligibility and Acceptance
content: To use SmartHoster services, you must be:
list: At least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into contracts;
The legal owner or authorized agent of the property listed;
In compliance with all applicable local, national, and international laws.

sections.title: Scope of Service
list: Property listing setup and channel integration (e.g. Airbnb, Booking.com)
Guest communication and check-in coordination (including smart lock systems)
Cleaning and maintenance scheduling
Local lodging compliance support (SEF/AIMA/AT/eFatura)
Revenue reporting, accounting summaries, and fiscal documentation
Optional supply, towel, and linen programs via internal vendors

sections.title: Client Responsibilities
list: Provide accurate and up-to-date property and ownership information;
Maintain your property in a safe and habitable condition;
Pay fees promptly and comply with payment terms outlined in any signed agreement;
Abide by all applicable housing, tax, and short-term rental laws;
Notify us in writing of any property damage, guest disputes, or legal proceedings related to your unit(s).

sections.title: Payment Terms
content: SmartHoster generally charges a commission-based fee structure (e.g. 30% of gross booking value) unless otherwise agreed in writing.

Cleaning fees are passed through to third-party or internal cleaning teams. Any additional services (e.g. linen provision, onboarding, or photography) will be billed separately. SmartHoster may deduct its fees automatically via booking channels or direct invoicing.
Late payments may incur administrative fees or suspension of services.

sections.title: Liability Limitations
content: To the fullest extent permitted by law:
list: SmartHoster shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages, including loss of income, data, reputation, or goodwill.
We are not liable for any issues arising from third-party platforms (e.g. Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com), including guest cancellations, system outages, or pricing fluctuations.
We are not responsible for force majeure events, such as strikes, natural disasters, pandemics, regulatory changes, or internet failures.
All liability is strictly capped to the total fees paid by you to SmartHoster in the 12 months preceding any claim.

sections.title: No Guarantee of Occupancy or Revenue
content: While we use industry-leading tools and strategies to maximize bookings and returns, SmartHoster does not guarantee any specific occupancy rate, revenue, or return on investment. Past performance is not a predictor of future results.

sections.title: Account Access and Communications
content: You may be provided with access to SmartHoster dashboards, portals, or tools. You agree:
list: Not to share login credentials or grant unauthorized access;
That we may communicate via email, SMS, WhatsApp, or platform notifications;
That some communications (e.g. system updates, invoice notices) are mandatory.

You are granted a limited, revocable, non-transferable license to use these tools solely for your personal or business use within SmartHoster's scope.
You may not copy, reverse-engineer, sublicense, or exploit any part of our technology or content.

sections.title: Termination
content: SmartHoster may suspend or terminate services at any time, with or without cause, by providing written notice. Immediate termination may occur for:
list: Failure to pay fees;
Violation of legal obligations;
Misuse of the platform or technology;
Behavior harmful to guests, partners, or reputation.

sections.title: Data & Privacy
content: SmartHoster processes personal data in accordance with its Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to such processing and confirm that all data provided is lawful and authorized.
We may process guest data on your behalf for the purpose of regulatory compliance (e.g. SEF, AIMA) under a data processor agreement.

content: These Terms are governed by Portuguese law. Any dispute arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of Porto, Portugal.
BBAR Unipessoal LDA reserves the right to seek injunctive or equitable relief in any jurisdiction to protect its rights or confidential information.
